context: Do you know anything about the book A Walk to Remember?
It is a teen drama written by Nicholas Sparks.
He has written quite a few books, do you remember any of the other titles?
Yes, I also known him to write Two By Two, True Beleiver, and Three Weeks With My Brother. Do you like any of those books?
I have not read them, but I did hear True Believer was made into a Drama.
resp: Yes, it is a drama and crime fiction as well. Do you like crime fiction stories too?
